actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill authorizing the removal of a rock ledge and certain other material in the Arthur Kill at Perth Amboy, NJ.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to remove a certain rock ledge at Perth Amboy, New Jersey. Authorizes the appropriation of $6,000,000 to carry out this Act.

titles.title: A bill authorizing the removal of a rock ledge and certain other material in the Arthur Kill at Perth Amboy, NJ.
